description.para: The selfcheck module performs a self assessment on the host noitd instance.

checkconfig.parameter: The name of the feed that will be sized.

example.title: Testing the local noitd instance.
example.para: We self check the noitd instance every 5 seconds. Here, the target doesn't mean anything in particular as the check is entirely internal. The target should match the local noitd's IP address from the perspective of stratcond.
